title.rendered: tagDiv Web Solutions & CMS Development Services

content.rendered:
Services

Web Solutions &
CMS Development

We have extensive experience in a wide variety of web projects including Online Portals, E-Commerce and Content Management Systems (CMS)

Visit our CMS Development Portfolio

Your success is our focus

Work with our highly skilled team and get everything done faster. We're using the latest technologies and advanced expertise on any project, from small business websites to complex web applications. You'll have one of the best Eastern Europe teams of web developers ready to create solutions that help your business grow.

Seamless functionality

Need your website to be a mighty tool that supports your core business? This is what we deliver. We'll develop a scalable web platform to match your business needs and new features as your company grows.

Easy to manage

Content management will always be easy & intuitive. You have complete control over the site. No matter how advanced your technical skills are, you can manage your website to keep it up to date and relevant for customers.

Stand out from the crowd

Choose the perfect team for your project. At tagDiv, we create more than web design and functionality. We create innovative and fresh websites with an online visual identity that makes your business unique from your competitors.

Dedicated development team

With our dedicated development teams, we can guarantee that each project gets the best skillset and the right level of attention. We'll select the perfect team based on the technical & creative requirements. Also, we'll consider the necessary amount of work and the deadline.

Get in touch

PHP Development

We provide PHP development services for a variety of projects. You are in the right place if your project is e-commerce, Online portal, content management solution, SAAS, B2B and B2C marketplaces, or industry-specific applications.

Our expertise area also includes PHP open source integration, customization, and development services for WordPress, CakePHP, HTML, CSS, Vue.js, jQuery, MySQL. Over 150 successful project stand as proof of our expertise.

We support you in each step of the project and build it in stages while you have complete control. From PHP consultancy, estimation to quality assurance and launching to production, we've got you covered.

Book a free consultation

Digital Support Services

  • Code Audits
  • Code Refactoring
  • Comprehensive Digital Maintenance
  • Web Core Vitals Optimization
  • Performance Optimization
  • Database Optimization

WordPress Development

  • Software as a Service
  • Multisite Development
  • Building Custom Plugins
  • Content Management Systems
  • Custom Web Development Services
  • eCommerce on WordPress

Web Solution Development

  • JavaScript Development
  • Open-Source Web Development
  • Web Solutions
  • Web Design Integration
  • WordPress Enterprise Integration
  • Full-service Development

Design and Front-end Development

  • Crafting Unique Designs
  • Building Custom WordPress Themes
  • Architecting Theme Frameworks
  • Corporate Identity Design
  • Responsive Wireframing
  • Visual Design

Our Expertise

Highest quality solutions

Online Portals / websites, CRM, CMS, SaaS, APIs integrations, Web Apps, Enterprise Apps

Diverse industry experience

E-commerce, Retail, B2B, Media, Enterprise, Travel, Education, Finance, Human Resources

Before the project started, I had a simple but functional website. However, it needed a major overhaul, and I made a list of requirements. The main goal was to make the site more visually appealing, and it worked. tagDiv implemented the design and functionality changes. The site traffic increased by over 35% in two months, in part because it looks more professional well thought out. tagDiv increased traffic, and readers responded well to the new design. The team's WordPress knowledge and custom theme were very effective. They never gave up.

Karl Rosqvist

Owner & Webmaster, VPNBasen

Our PHP Skill Set:

PHP Frameworks

  • Laravel
  • Codeigniter
  • Symfony
  • Lumen
  • Magento

Database

  • MySQL/Mariadb
  • MongoDB
  • ElasticSearch
  • Redis
  • Graph Database
  • Microsoft SQL Server

Rich interfaces

  • VueJS
  • JQuery
  • Bootstrap
  • React
  • Angular
  • Knockout

Server technologies

  • Docker / Kubernetes
  • Apache
  • Nginx
  • AWS
  • Google Cloud
  • RabbitMQ

Tools

  • tagDiv Composer
  • Git
  • Swagger
  • Apiary
  • Jira
  • Docker Compose
  • Composer

Web services

  • RESTful
  • XML-RPC
  • SOAP
  • GRPC
  • Socket.io

Data access

  • Eloquent ORM
  • Doctrine ORM
  • ODBC

Security

  • LDAP
  • Logging
  • HTTPS/SSL

Request a free quote for your project

Get the best the development services you need from our friendly team. E-mail us at services@tagdiv.com or submit your information about your project and we will send you back a custom quotation. It's easy as a summer breeze!

Book free consultation
